summary:
About Explainer Docs Blog Forum - Interoperable Network and Blockchain agnostic.

Scalable Higher TPS than all major networks

Free No gas or interchange!

Decentralized & Secure  Employs next-generation hardware standards used by global payment providers without the need for traditional payment networks or blockchains.

Global and Open-Source  Establishes a universally accessible payment infrastructure, transcending borders, currencies, and the limitations of conventional online payments.

Offline and Private  Conduct transactions offline without intermediaries
